summary: This bill, the Transparency In Charges for Key Events Ticketing Act (TICKET Act), aims to increase transparency in the event ticketing market. It requires ticket issuers and secondary market sellers to prominently display the total ticket price, including all fees, in advertisements and throughout the purchasing process. It also addresses speculative ticketing, resale practices, and refund requirements in cases of event cancellation or postponement. The bill mandates the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) to report on the enforcement of the Better Online Ticket Sales Act of 2016.
